com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer

Class SpinAndYieldBarrier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer.BarrierBase
      • com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer.SpinBarrier
        • com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer.SpinAndYieldBarrier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Barrier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpinYieldAndParkBarrier

    public class SpinAndYieldBarrier
extends SpinBarrier
    Spin and yield Barrier implementation.

    A mid-point is chosen between the initial spin count and 0 which becomes the threshold at which, instead of spinning, the current thread is forced to yield instead. Therefore prior to the yield threshold being crossed the calling thread spins (as per the base class procedure) but once the yield threshold is crossed the calling thread yields each time the desired sequence number is not available.

    • Method Detail

      • nonBlockingPause

        protected int nonBlockingPause(int spinCount)
        Description copied from class: SpinBarrier
        Sub-class hook to provide less resource intensive behavior.

        This method is guaranteed to be called exactly once every time the required sequence number is not available.

        Overrides:
        nonBlockingPause in class SpinBarrier
        Parameters:
        spinCount - The current spin count. This will be whatever was returned the last time this method was invoked (or the initial value on the first invocation).
        Returns:
        The new spin count.
